name: Covid Control
description:
WASD to move.

Left Click to fire your spray or put masks on people. 

Right Click to toggle between your spray and putting masks on. 

Mouse to aim. 

Full screen mode recommended. 

10 total waves to clear!

----

This game was part of the GMTK July 2020 Game Jam and made in less than 48 hours. 

----

Most of the art and audio from opengameart.org.
